//@2: NOTE: This file is to be used with npm to build out your libraries and SCSS
If you do not intend to use npm, you can ignore this file
-- Most likely you want: npm run scss
name: ebi_framework

scripts.test: echo "To do: no test specified" && exit 1
scripts.scss: node-sass -o css css && csso ./css/ebi-global.css --output ./css/ebi-global.min.css && npm run foundation-scss
//@14: -- Our buildscript: With this line we concat all libraries to be installed at once --
scripts.libraries: npm run tablesorter && npm run foundation-update && npm run message_finished
//@18: -- All our libraries, not intended to be run indiviudually --
//@22: -- Need to update this to pull from foundation repo at https://github.com/zurb/foundation-sites --
scripts.foundation-update: wget http://foundation.zurb.com/sites/download/complete -d ./libraries/foundation-6.zip && del ./libraries/foundation-6 && extract-zip ./libraries/foundation-6.zip ./libraries/foundation-6/ && del ./libraries/foundation-6.zip && echo "Copying foundation JS files one level up as they've moved..." && ncp ./libraries/foundation-6/js/vendor/ ./libraries/foundation-6/js/
